meanings.sent1: A single slice of cake suffices for me.
meanings.sent2: Having a glass of water suffices to quench my thirst.
meanings.sent3: One umbrella suffices for the two of us in this light rain.
meanings.sent4: His smile suffices to brighten up even the gloomiest day.
meanings.sent5: A warm hug suffices to convey love without words.

meanings.definition: To meet the needs or requirements
meanings.sent1: A quick phone call suffices to confirm the appointment.
meanings.sent2: Eating a balanced diet suffices to maintain good health.
meanings.sent3: A funny joke suffices to lighten the mood in a tense situation.
meanings.sent4: Her determination suffices to overcome any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: A sincere apology suffices to mend a broken relationship.
